body.p: “There were 6 great scollops or rather triangular points on the hind edge of his shell- 3 on each side- the middle one of each three the longest- about ¾ of an inch- He had surprisingly stout hooked jaws of a grey color or bluish grey- the upper shutting over the under- - a more or less sharp triangular beak sorresponding to one below & his flippers were armed with very stout claws 1 ¼ inches long.”
